project

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Agent, InanimateObject

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Entity is the main class of all the entities in the Environment. It has all the common variables of the different types of entities and some common methods. This is an abstract class.

      • checkSamePosition

        protected int checkSamePosition(Entity toCheck)
        Method called by an Entity that checks if a given Entity occupies the same position as it;
        Parameters:
        toCheck - is the entity that we are verifying.
        Returns:
        This method returns -1 if the entities aren't in the same position and 1 if they are.
